title: my luck is unreal
body: another mage arena with 0 fireballs and 0 flame strikes.  play against 3 mages in a row, get turn 2 flame cannoned, turn 4 fireballed, and turn 7 flame striked.  every game.  first 2 games i got flame striked 3 times, last game 2 times.  meanwhile i havent drafted a single flamestrike in over 5 mage runs.  i think im never picking mage again, its getting fucking stupid.
